name: Toño vs The Army of "El del Moño Rojo"
name_original: Toño vs The Army of "El del Moño Rojo"
description:
When our hero was about to take a nap at his house in Lalcayne, a boy knocked on his door:

- "The city of Murcius has been invaded by a horde of terrifying monsters! They say that their ringleader is "Eldelmonyorojo" himself!

Armed with his powerful monster ball blaster and handy jetpack, our hero will forget about his nap and head to town to put an end to the plague before it's too late!
